name: saw
description: Tool with serrated blade for cutting wood or materials.

name: axe
description: Tool with heavy blade for chopping wood or trees.

name: sleeping bag
description: Insulated sack for sleeping outdoors or camping.

name: cooking pot
description: Container for boiling or cooking food over heat.

name: ferro rod
description: Metal rod that sparks to start fires easily.

name: canteen
description: Portable container used for carrying drinking water.

name: fishing line and hooks
description: Gear used to catch fish in water.

name: gill net
description: Fishing net that traps fish by their gills.

name: wire
description: Thin metal strand used for binding or trapping.

name: knife
description: Sharp-edged tool for cutting or carving materials.

name: tarp
description: Waterproof sheet for shelter or ground cover.

name: food rations
description: Pre-measured supplies of food for survival.

name: bow with 6 arrows
description: Weapon using string tension to shoot arrows.

name: slinghsot
description: Y-shaped device launching projectiles with elastic bands.

name: bivy bag
description: Waterproof cover providing minimal sleeping shelter.

name: sharpening stone
description: Abrasive stone used to hone blade edges.

name: paracord
description: Strong lightweight cord used for tying or repairs.

name: multitool
description: Compact device combining multiple small tools in one.

name: skillet
description: Flat frying pan for cooking food over heat.

name: climbing rope
description: Strong rope used for climbing or securing loads.

name: hammock
description: Suspended fabric bed hung between two supports.

name: shovel
description: Tool with broad blade for digging or scooping.

name: soap
description: Cleansing substance used for washing and hygiene.

name: scotch-eyed auger
description: Hand drill for boring holes in wood.

name: salt
description: Mineral used for flavoring food or preservation.

name: machete
description: Large blade for chopping vegetation or clearing paths.
